Class PropertyTransaction

java.lang.Object
PropertyTransaction
public class PropertyTransaction
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a property transaction between two player through the bank. Figures out if both parties are interested and executes the transaction with the bank if so.
Version:
May 26, 2021
Author:
rohit

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PropertyTransaction​(Property property, int price, Player targetedOwner, Bank bank)
    Create a new PropertyTransaction object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void acceptTransaction()
    Accepts the transaction and executes it based on its fields.
    void askToAuction()
    Asks to auction the property.
    Player getCurrentOwner()
    Gets the current owner of the property
    int getPrice()
    Gets the price of the transaction.
    Property getProperty()
    Gets property in transaction.
    Player getTargetedOwner()
    Gets the player that the transaction is selling to.
    boolean processTransaction()
    Determines if the player will accept or deny the transaction.
    int requestTargetedOwner()
    Requests player to buy the property at a price
    void requestTargetedOwnerLiftMortgage()
    Asks if the targeted owner wants to lift the mortgage of the property.

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • PropertyTransaction

      public PropertyTransaction​(Property property, int price, Player targetedOwner, Bank bank)
      Create a new PropertyTransaction object.
      Parameters:
      property - property that is being moved
      price - price of transaction
      targetedOwner - owner to send to
      bank - bank associated with transaction

    • getPrice

      public int getPrice()
      Gets the price of the transaction.
      Returns:
      price

    • processTransaction

      public boolean processTransaction()
      Determines if the player will accept or deny the transaction.
      Returns:
      true if accepted, false otherwise

    • requestTargetedOwner

      public int requestTargetedOwner()
      Requests player to buy the property at a price
      Returns:
      price the player wants to buy at

    • requestTargetedOwnerLiftMortgage

      public void requestTargetedOwnerLiftMortgage()
      Asks if the targeted owner wants to lift the mortgage of the property.
